OUTPUT_S3_PATH.description: S3 bucket path for saving Athena query results.
OUTPUT_S3_PATH.title: OUTPUT_S3_PATH

AWS_REGION.description: The AWS region to use for Athena queries, defaults to AWS CLI default region.
AWS_REGION.title: AWS_REGION

AWS_PROFILE.description: AWS CLI profile to use, defaults to 'default' profile.
AWS_PROFILE.title: AWS_PROFILE

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS access key for authentication, if not using IAM role or environment variables.
AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.title: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS secret key for authentication, if not using IAM role or environment variables.
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.title: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY

AWS_SESSION_TOKEN.description: Session token for temporary AWS credentials, if using temporary access.
AWS_SESSION_TOKEN.title: AWS_SESSION_TOKEN

QUERY_TIMEOUT_MS.description: Timeout setting for queries in milliseconds (default: 300000 ms).
QUERY_TIMEOUT_MS.title: QUERY_TIMEOUT_MS

MAX_RETRIES.description: Number of retry attempts for failed queries (default: 100).
MAX_RETRIES.title: MAX_RETRIES

RETRY_DELAY_MS.description: Delay between retry attempts in milliseconds (default: 500 ms).
RETRY_DELAY_MS.title: RETRY_DELAY_MS
